item.title: How to set up Anaconda and Jupyter Notebook the right way
item.description: If Anaconda (conda) and Jupyter Notebook (Jupyter Lab) are set up the right way the combination of them can become the perfect team, where you are able to easily switch between Deep Learning conda environments.
